A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars: The Last Jedi has easily become the worst movie in the Star Wars Saga. Taking the viewer through a boring and nonsensical subplot and going against past movies in terms of how the force and hyperspace works. And then proceeded to rehash a multitude amount of scenes from Episodes 4-6. The Last Jedi should be fully removed from the Star Wars canon and looked upon as an utter and complete failure.
